tool_description: Quality riddles perfect for entertainment apps. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/riddles
name: Riddles by API-Ninjas
title: Riddles by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/riddles
api_list.description: API Ninjas Riddles API endpoint. Returns one or more random riddles.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return. Must be between 1 and 20. Default is 1.

test_endpoint.title: I'm A Number
test_endpoint.question: I'm between 1 and 1000. I'm a three digit number. I have a five in me. I'm almost half of 1000 What number am I ?
